LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_InitialMessage:
As you sit and talk with your friends from {1}, {0} tells that HE has seen an old spaceship near your colony. HECAP says that its hull looked mostly intact, so it still may hold some valuable treasures.

Do you want to investigate this rumor?
It may be nothing, or it may as HE says and you'll find some good loot there.
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_InitialMessageRejected: You don't give much to rumors told by {0} and ignore HIM.
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_SelectPawnsMessage: Select colonists to send to the spaceship.\nCAUTION: They will be gone for round about {0} days!
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_ButtonAssignError: You can't send everyone. Someone needs to watch over the colony!
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_ButtonSendError: Can't send. Noone assigned to go.
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_Message_ReturnedBase: Your team returned from the spaceship location.
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_Message_ReturnedNoTreas: They found a deep hole, but was it from a crashed spaceship?\nEven after an excessive search your team didn't find anything. If ever the spaceship was there, now it's gone.
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_Message_ReturnedWithTre: They found a deep hole. It looks like something big crashed into the earth.\nAfter an excessive search your team found the entrance into the vessel. In there they found pristine floors and lightened corridors, but also a slight radioactivity, preventing them to stay too long.\nBut in there they also did find something of value. They returned with..
LanguageData.RumorOfSpaceShip_Message_ReturnedWithEne: But caution, they also speak of pursuers!
